subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Paul Konerko, a serious slugger who never left the South Side of Chicago, is retiring his way, quietly, proud of the 2005 championship and of his unbroken string of seasons in black.
snippet: Paul Konerko, a serious slugger who never left the South Side of Chicago, is retiring his way, quietly, proud of the 2005 championship and of his unbroken string of seasons in black.
